title: Python: Personal Budget Tracker (CLI)
summary: A CLI app to record expenses, summarise totals by category, and export clean CSV for review.
problem: Track daily expenses quickly without complex apps.
solution: A command-line tool to add expenses, summarise totals by category, and export data to CSV for review.
highlights: Validates inputs and handles edge cases
Exports structured CSV for future visualisation

title: Java: Student Grade Calculator
summary: A Java console program that validates marks, calculates averages, and outputs grade categories.
problem: Convert raw marks into grade outcomes consistently.
solution: Console app that accepts marks, validates input, calculates average, and prints grade category.
highlights: Clear control flow and readable output
Easy to extend for multiple students

title: Automation: Downloads Folder File Organiser
summary: A safe automation script that organises downloads by file type with a dry-run mode and logging.
problem: Downloads folder becomes messy and hard to search.
solution: Script that sorts files into folders by type with a safe dry-run mode before moving anything.
highlights: Modular rules for new file types
